alert.note: Alert for Deuel (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 11:37PM MDT until May 30 at 12:15AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Deuel County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1236 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Toronto, or 7 miles east of Estelline, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Brandt around 1250 AM CDT. Clear Lake around 1255 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Gary, Altamont, Moritz, Lake Alice and Tunerville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
